Analyzers

Class CECFGAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • Analyzers.CECFGAnalysis

  • public class CECFGAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which stores ECFG analysis information associated with a production rule in a context free grammar.

    I.e, the sets: First, Follow and Last and the predicates: null, reach and empty.
